title: Mirai Nikki (Future Diary) 1-25 [1080p] [Dual Audio] ~Chrisazter
description:
This is an op by Chrisazter213 on Nyaa. #472157
OP>----------------------------------------------

Thanks to [Final8] and zeronaut from Animebytes for the 1080p Video Source with Japanese Subtitles(Also hardcoded subtitles for all the Songs/Signs encoded into the video !). Also thanks to LupintheNerd for english audio for episodes 1-4, and www.Animeratio.com for the english audio sources for episodes 5-26. 

But mostly i would like to thank myself, for putting in the time to mux the sources together, retime english audio, rename subtitle and audio tracks, and while I was at it I was able to watch the series. I was not able to slim down the file sizes so this upload will take you all awhile, although this was my biggest project so far, It was definitely worth the time put into it, since there are no plans for a Blu ray release any time soon, this is by far the best dual audio version available. 

Enjoy and please try to seed at 1:1 !

My Future Releases on Nyaa:
~~~Done for 2013, might be back in Q1 or Q2 in 2014...depends on my living situation if I will be able to upload or not. I will not be able to reseed until then so please keep these alive.
